title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, no results are found.
OB: Currently, when searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: The search functionality should display results when searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
1. Open the Package view. 
2. Select a package. 
3. Right-click on the package and select 'Search'. 
4. In the search dialog, enter a search term for declarations. 
5. Click 'Search'. 
6. Verify that the search results show the expected declarations within the selected package.
